com.absio.container

Class Access

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.absio.container.Access
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccessChanges

    public class Access
extends Object
    Describes a User's access to a Container. It contains metadata about the access itself (like who created it, when it happened, modification information, etc), permissions (ORed Permission values), when (if at all) the access will expire, the id of the container the access is for, who the access is for and their key blob. The Permission portion of the access is enforced by the Absio Broker™ application when using the ServerProvider.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Access

        public Access(UUID userId,
              int permissions)
        Create access with given user id and permissions. The permissions should be an ORed list of the flag values from Permission.getFlag(). The permissions are guaranteed to be respected and adhered to by the Absio Broker™ application when using the ServerProvider.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user id the access is for
        permissions - the ORed list of the flag values from Permission.getFlag()

      • Access

        public Access(UUID userId)
        Create access with given user id. It will have Permission.DEFAULT_USER_PERMISSIONS for the permissions. The permissions are guaranteed to be respected and adhered to by the Absio Broker™ application when using the ServerProvider.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user id the access is for

      • Access

        public Access(UUID userId,
              int permissions,
              org.threeten.bp.ZonedDateTime expiresAt)
        Create access with given user id, permissions and expiration time. The permissions should be an ORed list of the flag values from Permission.getFlag(). The permissions and expiration are guaranteed to be respected and adhered to by the Absio Broker™ application when using the ServerProvider.
        Parameters:
        userId - the user id the access is for
        permissions - the ORed list of the flag values from Permission.getFlag()
        expiresAt - the expiration time of the access

      • Access

        public Access(UUID containerId,
              org.threeten.bp.ZonedDateTime createdAt,
              UUID createdBy,
              org.threeten.bp.ZonedDateTime expiresAt,
              byte[] keyBlob,
              org.threeten.bp.ZonedDateTime modifiedAt,
              UUID modifiedBy,
              int permissions)
        Create access with given values. The permissions should be an ORed list of the flag values from Permission.getFlag(). The permissions and expiration are guaranteed to be respected and adhered to by the Absio Broker™ application when using the ServerProvider.
        Parameters:
        containerId - the id of the container this access is related to
        createdAt - when the access was created
        createdBy - who created the access
        expiresAt - the expiration time of the access
        keyBlob - the recipient key blob (key encrypted with AIES specifically for the user this access is for)
        modifiedAt - when the access was last modified
        modifiedBy - who modified the access last
        permissions - the ORed list of the flag values from Permission.getFlag()

        when the access expires

      • getKeyBlob

        public byte[] getKeyBlob()
        Get the encrypted key blob for the access user.

        NOTE: this will be null if the access is retrieved from the ServerProvider and it does not have the Permission.DECRYPT_CONTAINER.

        Returns:
        the encrypted key blob for the access user

      • setKeyBlob

        public void setKeyBlob(byte[] keyBlob)
        Set the encrypted key blob for the access user.

        NOTE: this will be null if the access is retrieved from the ServerProvider and it does not have the Permission.DECRYPT_CONTAINER.

        Parameters:
        keyBlob - the encrypted key blob for the access user
